data.comment: The big names in today's match at Ghelamco Arena have now been confirmed.
In the minute 12, Roman Yaremchuk puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Goal! Roman Yaremchuk extends Gent's lead to 2-0.
Goal! Gent extend their lead to 3-0 through Laurent Depoitre.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The away team have replaced Dario Van Den Buijs with Loris Brogno. This is the first substitution made today by Hernan Losada.
In the minute 51, Sulayman Marreh (Gent) has received a yellow card from Lothar D'Hondt.
Goal! Gent extend their lead to 4-0 through Laurent Depoitre.
Wim De Decker is making the team's first substitution at Ghelamco Arena with Giorgi Chakvetadze replacing Anderson Niangbo.
In the minute 66, Marius Noubissi is replacing Raphael Holzhauser for the away team.
The home team replace Osman Bukari with Matisse Samoise.
Joren Dom (Beerschot) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 78, Tim Kleindienst is on a sub for Roman Yaremchuk for Gent.
Gent take a comfortable 5-0 lead thanks to Matisse Samoise.
Hernan Losada (Beerschot) is making a third substitution, with Abdoulie Sanyang replacing Tarik Tissoudali.
The second-half is over. The match ends 5-1.
Goal! Ismaila Coulibaly pulls one back for Beerschot to make it 5-1.
